Articles.Content:
Hi,

I have a pretty strange bug going on.
When I start the tutorial "Go for orbit" i need to follow the pink target marker.
The problem is that the marker disapears as soon as I start the engines and when I let the SAS follow the pink marker the Rocket always crashes into the ground.
I have tried to do the mission without the marker but i get alway the notification that I failed the mission becaus I have not followed the direction of the marker.

 

Can someone help me to fix this issue? 

Thank you in advance!
